languages.text: "Твое тело не выдержит, Домин'{name}. Кости сломаются. Сухожилия разорвутся. Сердце остановится. Наши ритуалы самосовершенствования бесконечны, они требуют абсолютной отдачи и особых многолетних тренировок. Если у тебя в запасе есть тридцать лишних лет... Что ж. Быть может ты обучишься основам".

"Your body will fail you, Domin'{name}. Your bones will break. Your tendons will snap. Your heart will stop. Our rituals of self-perfection are unending, they demand absolute dedication and decades of special training. However, if you devote the next thirty years of your life to its study... you might be able to learn the basics."
languages.original_text: "Твое тело не выдержит, Домин'{name}. Кости сломаются. Сухожилия разорвутся. Сердце остановится. Быть может ты обучишься основам".

traits.locale_text: "Your body will fail you, Enim'{name}. Your bones will break. Your tendons will snap. Your heart will stop. Ahn'shini is an unending path of self-perfection that demands absolute dedication and decades of special training. If you have thirty years to spare... Very well. You may be able to learn the basic disciplines."

You may be able to learn the basic disciplines."

languages.text: «Su cuerpo le fallará, Domin'{name}. Sus huesos se quebrarán. Sus tendones se partirán. Su corazón se detendrá. Nuestros rituales de perfeccionamiento son una senda interminable que exige una entrega absoluta y décadas de entrenamiento especial. No obstante, si dedica los próximos treinta años de su vida a su estudio... quizá consiga aprender los fundamentos más básicos».
languages.original_text: "Your body will fail you, Domin'{name}. Your bones will break. Your tendons will snap. Your heart will stop. Our rituals of self-perfection are unending, they demand absolute dedication and decades of special training. However, if you devote the next thirty years of your life to its study... you might be able to learn the basics."

traits.locale_text: «Su cuerpo le fallará, Domin'{name}. Sus huesos se quebrarán. Sus tendones se partirán. Su corazón se detendrá. Nuestros rituales de perfeccionamiento son una senda interminable que exige una entrega absoluta y décadas de entrenamiento especial. No obstante, si dedica los próximos treinta años de su vida a su estudio... quizá consiga aprender los fundamentos más básicos».

languages.text: 「体がもたない、ドミン・{name}。骨が折れて、腱が切れて、心臓が止まる。儀式は絶え間ない自己変革の道であり、絶対的な献身と、何十年にもわたる特別な訓練が必要になる。とはいえ、これからの30年をその研究に捧げるというのなら…基本ぐらいは学べるかもしれないわ」
languages.original_text: "Your body will fail you, Domin'{name}. Your bones will break. Your tendons will snap. Your heart will stop. Our rituals of self-perfection are unending, they demand absolute dedication and decades of special training. However, if you devote the next thirty years of your life to its study... you might be able to learn the basics."

traits.locale_text: 「体がもたない、ドミン・{name}。骨が折れて、腱が切れて、心臓が止まる。儀式は絶え間ない自己変革の道であり、絶対的な献身と、何十年にもわたる特別な訓練が必要になる。とはいえ、これからの30年をその研究に捧げるというのなら…基本ぐらいは学べるかもしれないわ」

languages.text: “你的身体会辜负你的愿望，秘者{name}。你的骨骼会断裂，肌腱会撕开，心脏会停止跳动。我们的训练是一条永无止境的自我完善之路，需要一刻不停的奉献与长达数十年的特别训练。不过，如果你将未来三十年的全部人生都投入其中的话……或许能学到最基本的技巧。”
languages.original_text: "Your body will fail you, Domin'{name}. Your bones will break. Your tendons will snap. Your heart will stop. Our rituals of self-perfection are unending, they demand absolute dedication and decades of special training. However, if you devote the next thirty years of your life to its study... you might be able to learn the basics."

traits.locale_text: “你的身体会辜负你的愿望，秘者{name}。你的骨骼会断裂，肌腱会撕开，心脏会停止跳动。我们的训练是一条永无止境的自我完善之路，需要一刻不停的奉献与长达数十年的特别训练。不过，如果你将未来三十年的全部人生都投入其中的话……或许能学到最基本的技巧。”

languages.text: "Euer Körper wird Euch im Stich lassen, Domin'{name}. Eure Knochen werden brechen. Eure Sehnen werden reißen. Euer Herz wird nicht mehr schlagen. Unsere Rituale der Selbstperfektionierung enden niemals und erfordern absolute Hingabe und jahrzehntelanges Training. Wenn Ihr allerdings die nächsten dreißig Jahre Eures Lebens investiert ... erlernt Ihr vielleicht die Grundlagen."
languages.original_text: "Your body will fail you, Domin'{name}. Your bones will break. Your tendons will snap. Your heart will stop. Our rituals of self-perfection are unending, they demand absolute dedication and decades of special training. However, if you devote the next thirty years of your life to its study... you might be able to learn the basics."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Körper wird Euch im Stich lassen, Domin'{name}. Eure Knochen werden brechen. Eure Sehnen werden reißen. Euer Herz wird nicht mehr schlagen. Unsere Rituale der Selbstperfektionierung enden niemals und erfordern absolute Hingabe und jahrzehntelanges Training. Wenn Ihr allerdings die nächsten dreißig Jahre Eures Lebens investiert ... erlernt Ihr vielleicht die Grundlagen."

languages.text: « Votre corps vous trahira, Domin'{name}. Vos os se briseront. Vos tendons se déchireront. Votre cœur s'arrêtera. Nos rituels de perfectionnement sont infinis, et en cela, ils exigent un dévouement absolu et des décennies de formation intensive. Cela étant dit, si vous consacrez les trente prochaines années de votre vie à son étude... vous réussirez peut-être à en maîtriser les rudiments. »
languages.original_text: "Your body will fail you, Domin'{name}. Your bones will break. Your tendons will snap. Your heart will stop. Our rituals of self-perfection are unending, they demand absolute dedication and decades of special training. However, if you devote the next thirty years of your life to its study... you might be able to learn the basics."

languages.original_text: "Your body will fail you, Domin'. Your bones will break. Your tendons will snap. Your heart will stop. Our rituals of self-perfection are unending, they demand absolute dedication and decades of special training. However, if you devote the next thirty years of your life to its study... you might be able to learn the basics."

languages.text: "Bedenin sana ihanet edecek Domin'{name}. Kemiklerin kırılacak. Sinirlerin kopacak. Kalbin duracak. Kendimizi geliştirme ayinlerimizin sonu yoktur. Mutlak adanmışlık ve onlarca yıl süren özel bir eğitim şarttır. Ancak olur da ömrünün sonraki otuz yılını bu eğitime adarsan... İşin temelini öğrenme ihtimalin var."
languages.original_text: "Your body will fail you, Domin'{name}. Your bones will break. Your tendons will snap. Your heart will stop. Our rituals of self-perfection are unending, they demand absolute dedication and decades of special training. However, if you devote the next thirty years of your life to its study... you might be able to learn the basics."
